doc.title: MLB 2006
doc.plot: MLB 2006 steps up to the plate and comes out swinging for the fences with an all-new PlayMaker Fielding Marker that provides better fielding interaction by combining player attributes with your skill level to make the play. All-new Release Point Pitching helps determine your ability to hit or miss your spots; a deeper Franchise Mode with a Morale System and an all-new Career Mode where you actually call the shots. Returning gameplay favorites include: enhanced Branch Point Technology (BPT) for seamless fielding transitions and smooth base running, EyeToy functionality and online playability.
